org.easetech.easytest.converter

Class ConverterSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easetech.easytest.converter.ConverterSupport

  • public class ConverterSupport
extends Object
    A convenient support class that gives users access to various defined parameters that may be useful during data conversion
